Just take it from some of our members
I definitely recommend getting a membership. The perks and extra discounts more than pays for itself.
We try to be an active family. The membership is great for our needs. It gets us off the couch and jumping together multiple times every month.
For our busy family the flexibility of our membership is a blessing! Thanks for giving us a great space to get the energy out.
Everyone knows that Sky Zone is the ultimate destination for anyone looking for an epic day of high-flying fun. But did you know there’s an easy way to take that excitement to the next level whenever you want? All you need is a Sky Zone Membership — but this isn’t the old-school
trampoline park Membership
you’re thinking of. This is
so
much better, trust us!
Sky Zone was founded on the idea that a
trampoline park Membership
was the best way to bring families together, whether that’s by celebrating a birthday, getting out of the house on a rainy day or meeting up with friends for a weekend playdate. However, a Sky Zone Membership brings a lot more to the table than a basic
trampoline park Membership.
Let us explain why.
For starters, becoming a Member is a great way to save a little cash and unlocks unlimited access to all the attractions at Sky Zone. We go way beyond a typical
trampoline membership; a Sky Zone Membership, available in two different levels, means you’re
getting the most from your Sky Zone experience.
Forget what you thought you knew about
a trampoline membership
. Our Basic Memberships include Activity Time, Fuel Zone discounts and exclusive access to Members-only events. Elite Memberships include those great perks plus access to Sky Zone programs, party discounts and even special parent perks — because Sky Zone isn’t just for kids. It’s for everyone!
If you’re interested in becoming a Member or want to know more about our
Membership
options, feel free to contact us or visit your local Sky Zone. Our friendly staff will be happy to assist you and answer any questions you may have. Members fly higher at Sky Zone, and you’ll experience it firsthand when you sign up.
CHANGE OR CANCEL YOUR MEMBERSHIP
Here’s everything you need to know/do to make changes to your membership plan.
MANAGE MY MEMBERSHIP
FAQ
The last thing we want to do is leave you hanging. So we’re here to answer all your questions. And if you’re not finding what you need here, feel free to call your local park for extra support.
Why should I sign up for a Membership?
We love our Guests and believe it’s important to Play. Every. Day! So we created a monthly Membership program that allows access to Sky Zone whenever you want at a great value to you and your family!​
What is a parent add-on Membership?
A parent add-on Membership can be applied to an Elite Membership so that a legal guardian can enjoy all the same benefits as their child for a low monthly price. The Parent Membership applies only to the original registered parent.
Are there black out dates for the Membership?
No! Your Membership can be used throughout the year. See park hours for our Open Jump times.
Can I cancel anytime?
Yes! The membership is month-to-month. Just give us a heads-up of at least 3 business days and we’ll process the cancellation. You’ll still have access to all the awesome membership benefits and perks until your cancellation date.
How do I cancel my Membership?
For more information on how to cancel please visit
HERE
Is my Membership valid at all Sky Zone locations?
Membership is only valid at the park you originally signed up at.

Why should I sign up for a Membership?
We love our Guests and believe it’s important to Play. Every. Day! So we created a monthly Membership program that allows access to Sky Zone whenever you want at a great value to you and your family!​
What is a parent add-on Membership?
A parent add-on Membership can be applied to an Elite Membership so that a legal guardian can enjoy all the same benefits as their child for a low monthly price. The Parent Membership applies only to the original registered parent.
Are there black out dates for the Membership?
No! Your Membership can be used throughout the year. See park hours for our Open Jump times.  ***Sky Zone Ocala Basic Members must check in before 1:00 PM on Fridays, Saturdays, and Sundays.
Can I cancel anytime?
You can cancel your Membership after completing your minimum commitment based on your agreement (6 months). To cancel your Sky Zone Ocala Membership, please email us at least 7 days before the billing cycle.  Refer to your agreement or ask a Team Member for full details. Cancellation requests CANNOT be processed by phone.
Is my Membership valid at all Sky Zone locations?
Membership is only valid at the park you originally signed up at.

About Sky Zone
We’re the originators of wall-to-wall aerial action, and we never stand still. We’re always working to invent epic new ways to play, gather, and compete. The only way to understand it is to come experience it. So rally your crew and let’s go!
We believe in the Power of Play
The kind of play that makes us jump and dodge and flip and sweat and laugh and bob and weave until we need to drink some water and lie down. Play where you can be you, in the moment, free. The kind of play that is good for our bodies and even better for our brains.
Sky Zone is a space to move, create and be yourself. And there’s enough room for everyone, so all kids – and kids at heart – can play together. Our vision is a world where everyone plays, every day.
Sky Zone is the world’s largest developer, operator, and franchisor of trampoline and active entertainment parks with a network of more than 300 global locations.
What our Guests are Saying
I definitely recommend getting a membership. The perks and extra discounts more than pays for itself.
We try to be an active family. The membership is great for our needs. It gets us off the couch and jumping together multiple times every month.
We’re Always Up To Something New
Check out our new parks coming soon and give us a follow on social media.

Group Events
Throw an event unlike any other for your coworkers, campers, classroom, team or any other large party
Find a Participating Park
You Bring The Group
Sky Zone has hosted thousands upon thousands of fun group events, from schools and church groups to camps, corporate team building and boy/girl scouts. You name it, we’ve hosted it. Our facility offers a wide range of large group activities that are sure to keep everyone entertained.
We Bring The Fun
Take your group to the SKY with fun group events! Sky Zone would love to host you, and we offer some of the most unique, FUN, and fit activities around on our patented, all-trampoline, walled playing courts. No matter how big or small your group may be, we can accommodate you. Our venue is perfect for corporate group events, fostering team building, and creating lasting memories.
Plan An Amazing Event With Us
We offer special rates for large group activities of 10 or more for jump time. You can purchase your tickets for a group of up to 29 jumpers. If your group is larger than 29 jumpers and/or you’d like to reserve meeting space or discuss food options give us a call!
Memberships
Make jump time anytime with a Sky Zone Membership. Play and Re-Play Every Day! Become a Sky Zone Member and get exclusive discounts, swag and access to Member-only events.Compare our Membership packages and sign up today.
Become A Member
Birthday Parties
Epic for them. Easy for you. Whether it's a birthday party, team party or any other special occasion, we're here to help you celebrate the right way at Sky Zone. Find out more about our party packages and book today.
Compare Packages
Jump Tickets
Visit our park to jump, spin, flip, play and a whole lot more. Learn more about our general admission options and book your ticket to fun here.

Group Events
Throw an event unlike any other for your coworkers, campers, classroom, team or any other large party
You Bring The Group
Sky Zone has hosted thousands upon thousands of group events, from schools and church groups to camps, corporate team building and boy/girl scouts. You name it, we’ve hosted it.
We Bring The Fun
Want to take your group to the SKY? Sky Zone would love to host you, and we offer some of the most unique, FUN, and fit activities around on our patented, all-trampoline, walled playing courts. No matter how big or small your group may be, we can accommodate you.
Plan An Amazing Event With Us
We offer special rates for groups of 15 or more for jump time. You can purchase your tickets for a group of up to 29 jumpers. If your group is larger than 29 jumpers and/or you’d like to reserve meeting space or discuss food options give us a call!
